name: La Sportiva TX2 Approach Shoes - Women's
description: Approach, hiking, scrambling – these supportive, packable shoes are built to perform on rock and dirt. Sticky rubber soles grip to granite, and they drain well in case a creek crossing is part of your route. One cool feature is how you can fold them flat using an embedded shock cord, which lets you carry them on multipitches without taking up much room on your harness.Upper is knit polyester mesh for lightweight breathability.Liquid rubber rand has side cut-outs where the shoe flexes to prevent it from pulling away from the upper.Lined with non-slip mesh for a secure fit.Shockcord loop is tucked in a groove on the heel, can be deployed to fold shoes and link them together for carrying.Flared fifth metatarsal area adds stability and rigidity.Vibram® Mega-Grip Traverse-Lite sole is super-sticky for grip on technical approaches.
